71-6317.Asbestos Control Act; act, how cited.

Sections 71-6301 to 71-6317 shall be known and may be cited as the Asbestos Control Act.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 1073, § 18;Laws 1995, LB 406, § 80;Laws 2007, LB463, § 1259.

Cross ReferencesAsbestos removal, credentialing provisions, see sections 38-1,119 to 38-1,123.

sections.heading: 71-6301 to 71-6317 shall be known and may be cited as the Asbestos Control Act.
